front.title: •Accuser
front.gametext: May deploy -3 as a 'react'. May add 6 pilots, 8 passengers, 2 vehicles and 4 TIEs. Has ship-docking capability. Permanent pilot provides ability of 1.
front.lore: Modified for optimal crisis response time. Veteran crew experienced at monitoring shipping lanes and Imperial port traffic.

combo: Accuser + Imperial Helmsman Draw one battle destiny if not able to otherwise.
